topic: 11th Radiance Workshop - Call for speakers' extension
body:
Dear All,


This is a quick update to let you know that we are extending the Call for 
speakers to 31 August. We still have place in the programme and hope you 
will like to contribute with some of your own work, wishes and 
experiences.


http://www.radiance-online.org/radiance-workshop11/callforpapers.html


Best regards,


Nicolas
nicolas.roy at velux.com
___
